## About

The goal of our next meetup is for our attendees to become acquainted with R and R Studio in order to start their data analytics journey.

We will cover:

-   Brief intro to R as a programming language
-   Functions, data structures, data types
-   Reading data into R Basic data visualization in R
-   R packages
-   Examples and use cases

If time allows we will briefly introduce to you R Markdown and give a glimpse into how to make your analysis more reproducible.

We recommend you bring your own laptop where you have [R](https://cran.r-project.org/) and [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/) installed. In case you want to install [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com), you can follow the instructions from [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/installation.html).

See you soon!
